name: Intacore | Managed IT Services
tag_list: it-services, it-support, networking, managed-it-services, computer-maintenance, server-monitoring, technical-support, computer-services, cloud-computing, server-management, it-consultancy
overview:
Intacore a Microsoft Certified Partner, delivers truly dedicated 24x7 managed IT support, consulting and cloud computing services.

As a UK company specialising in providing IT services Intacore it delivers a range of IT solutions to suit the needs of businesses with a wide ranges of requirements.

The management of IT services is a complex and ever changing landscape, of new technology and ideas. In this rapidly changing industry, business is ever reliant on the availability of their IT.

Businesses are consistently looking to drive efficiency into their IT operations, increase performance and security, whilst reducing their overall operational expenditure and the burden on their resources.

Intacore exist to help reduce these demands on businesses, so they can focus on running their operations. We operate 24 hours a day throughout the UK, split between four offices.

Drawing on years of experience in the IT industry, Intacore delivers clarity, dedication and certainty to SMB’s through to large multinational organisations.
